description: Most Excel users will not create or open DQY files. However, advanced users looking to import data from a database may create and open DQY files since they are useful for saving queries to be used again.
To create a DQY file with Query Wizard or Microsoft Query in Excel 365, follow these steps:

NOTE: DQY files are primarily used by Excel 2007 to 365 users.
